subject: RE: [junit] Junit capabilities
msgSnippet: I think that doing a code walkthrough of your unit test would be a great way to illustrate how to use your code.  But JUnit doesn t make that any easier (or
messageBody:
I think that doing a code walkthrough of your unit test would be a great
way to illustrate how to use your code. But JUnit doesn't make that any
easier (or harder) than any other unit testing tool. I'm having a hard
time visualizing how one might customize JUnit "to be used for code
reviews". It can certainly be customized a lot, in general. But I'm
not sure what you have in mind.


Todd.
